review: I had severe tooth pain , could not bear it at all.I met Dr Sujatha at Sparsh hospital.She reduced my pain immediately by starting the root canal treatment.I m very thankful for her painless root canal treatment as I have suffered with same dental pain with another doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I got my decayed teeth treated by Dr.Sujatha.I had fear of dentist but her approach has made me very happy. I'm really satisfied by her treatment. I would definitely recommend her for all my friends and family.She is celebrity dentist who has even come on TV9 in 2017.I had seen her on tv once and after that here again. I'm very happy n thankfull  to mam.

review: Dr. Sujatha mam is really good at her work. I was scared of getting pain but she explained proceedures patiently and was very friendly with me. Even after the completion of proceedures, I never felt a pain. She was so kind and talking to me as if she is my sister. I had a very good experience with her and i will refer my friends and family as well. Thank you mam. I am really happy with your treatment.
